prompt:
Patient: floods chronic

Nurse: I'm sorry to hear that, Mr. Valenzuela. Have you noticed any blood in your stool?

Patient: No.

Nurse: That's good to hear, Mr. Valenzuela. Have you been experiencing any nausea or vomiting along with the diarrhea?

Patient: No.

Nurse: I'm glad to hear that, Mr. Valenzuela. Have you been feeling weak, lethargic, faint, or dizzy at all?

Patient: No.

Nurse: Just give me a second to work out the best way I can assist you. Just give me a second to work out the best way I can assist you.

responses.gpt4: I appreciate you taking the time to share these details, Mr. Valenzuela. Have you noticed any changes in your appetite?
responses.our_model: I'm sorry, Mr. Valenzuela, could you please confirm what you just said?
